import React, {Component} from "react" import SelectFilter from './select' import toggleDecorator from '../decorators/toggleDecorator' import logo from '../logo.svg' import searchSign from '../search-sign.svg' class Header extends Component{ state={ opacity: 1, transformL: 'rotate(0deg)', transformR: 'rotate(0deg)', padding:'0 0 0 50px' } toggleSearchBtn=()=>{ this.setState({ opacity: this.state.opacity === 0 ? 1 : 0, paddingLeft: this.state.paddingLeft === 'padding:0 0 0 50px' ? 'padding:0 0 0 80px' : 'padding:0 0 0 50px', transformL: this.state.transformL === 'rotate(0deg)' ? 'rotate(-45deg)': 'rotate(0deg)', transformR: this.state.transformR === 'rotate(0deg)' ? 'rotate(45deg)': 'rotate(0deg)' }) } render(){ const styles = { transition: 'all .3s ease-out' } const {handleClick} = this.props const searchSign_btn = return(

FOR THE VOICE

1910-1920

FOR THE VOICE

AVANGARD RUSSIAN BOOK

ASSOCIATIONS, GROUPS AND PUBLISHING HOUSES

{ searchSign_btn }
{this.SearchComp}
) } get SearchComp(){ if (!this.props.isOpen) return null return (
) } } export default toggleDecorator(Header)
